1.title: Technology: RetroBytes
1.plot: Go back to the future with this look at the latest in home technology, as seen from the early '80s.

2.title: Sceince: Missions to Mars
2.plot: The Mars Rover missions have fascinated viewers for over ten years, but the stories behind the mission are compelling as well.

3.title: History: Finishing the Dream - Learning from the Civil Rights Era
3.plot: Original NBC reporting on civil rights milestones, from Montgomery to Memphis.

4.title: HEALTH: Going Organic
4.plot: With the sharp rise in the popularity and sales of food packaged as "organic," these pieces explore the origins of organic revolution in America and the new debate over how to define "organic."

5.title: Education: Innovations in Learning
5.plot: These stories explore issues and innovations in the front lines of education in America, from uniforms to testing, interactive learning to music education.

6.title: ARTS: Creative Writing
6.plot: These interviews with American authors and playwrights, culled from NBC News' -- from Norman Mailer to Joan Didion, William Styron to Joyce Carol Oates -- reveal the mysteries of the writing process.

imdb.plot outline: In honor of the historic Education Nation event being held across NBC News in September 2010, NBC Learn is making available this selection of educational packages. Watch original NBC News reports on the civil rights movement, from Montgomery to Memphis and beyond. Explore the stories behind the historic Mars Rovers mission, from Sojourner to Phoenix. Learn about issues and innovations on the front lines of American education. Learn the tricks of the trade in interviews with famous authors culled from NBC News' archives. And go back to the future with a look at the latest news in home technology -- at least as NBC reported it in the early 1980s. It's just a small taste of what can be found on nbclearn.com!
